dn7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
dn7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena dve pabbajita—
dn7:1.4: mundiyo ca paribbajako jaliyo ca darupattikantevasi yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu.
dn7:1.5: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho te dve pabbajita bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn7:1.6: “kim nu kho, avuso gotama, tam jivam tam sariram, udahu annam jivam annam sariran”ti?
dn7:1.7: “Tena havuso, sunatha sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
dn7:1.8: “Evamavuso”ti kho te dve pabbajita bhagavato paccassosum.
dn7:2.2: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu silasampanno hoti.
dn7:2.5: Yo kho, avuso, bhikkhu evam janati evam passati, kallam nu kho tassetam vacanaya:
dn7:2.6: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti vati.
dn7:2.7: Yo so, avuso, bhikkhu evam janati evam passati, kallam tassetam vacanaya:
dn7:2.8: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti vati.
dn7:2.9: Aham kho panetam, avuso, evam janami evam passami.
dn7:2.11: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti va …pe…

dn7:3.7: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti vati.
dn7:3.8: Aham kho panetam, avuso, evam janami evam passami.

dn7:5.2: Yo kho, avuso, bhikkhu evam janati evam passati, kallam nu kho tassetam vacanaya:
dn7:5.3: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti vati?
dn7:5.4: Yo so, avuso, bhikkhu evam janati evam passati, na kallam tassetam vacanaya:
dn7:5.5: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti vati.
dn7:5.6: Aham kho panetam, avuso, evam janami evam passami.
dn7:5.8: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti va”ti.
dn7:5.10: Attamana te dve pabbajita bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
